page.title: 03POPULATION
page.content: houses and services in the area.A fourth group of people include pensioners and{retired}people who have also moved into the area from other parts of the South West.The lack of stress involved in urban life which may be enjoyed by rural dwellers in Somerset is surely a major attraction! Alltogether although one will often therefore hear a rounded Somerset accent it is not at all unusual to hear a great many other accents as well. One is left with an impression of a healthy{balanced local community} in the Trull and Staplehay area,content with the life-style and not anxious to change much less the quality of life enjoyed at present is threatened.
